trigger_prototype.expression: {Template OSSO SMART:smart[info,{#DEVICE_SAS},SMART Health Status].str(OK)}<>1 and {Template OSSO SMART:smart[info,{#DEVICE_SAS},SMART Health Status].strlen()}>2
trigger_prototype.name: SMART: {#DEVICE_SAS} overall-health status failed on {HOST.NAME}
SMART: {#DEVICE_SAS} uncorrected read error count is too high on {HOST.NAME}
SMART: {#DEVICE_SAS} uncorrected write error count is too high on {HOST.NAME}
SMART: {#DEVICE_SATA} current pending sector count is too high on {HOST.NAME}
SMART: {#DEVICE_SATA} offline uncorrectable sector count is too high on {HOST.NAME}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template OSSO SMART:smart[info,{#DEVICE_SATA},SMART overall-health self-assessment test result].str(PASSED)}<>1 and {Template OSSO SMART:smart[info,{#DEVICE_SATA},SMART overall-health self-assessment test result].strlen()}>2
trigger_prototype.name: SMART: {#DEVICE_SATA} overall-health status failed on {HOST.NAME}
SMART: {#DEVICE_SATA} reallocated sector count is too high on {HOST.NAME}
SMART: {#DEVICE_SATA} uncorrectable error count is too high on {HOST.NAME}
SMART: {#DEVICE_SSD} SSD wear leveling count is low on {HOSTNAME}
SMART: {#DEVICE_SSD} SSD wearout indicator is low on {HOSTNAME}
